mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Admins (userName, password, permissions, createTime, updateTime, remarks) VALUES (#{userName}, #{password}, #{permissions}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks})
mapper.update: UPDATE Admins SET userName = #{userName}, password = #{password}, permissions = #{permissions}, createTime = #{createTime}, updateTime = #{updateTime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Admins ORDER BY ${sortField} LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
